properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1 v7 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Prabhuva padedha noka sthuti geetam Preminchi rakshinchitivi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Gata vathsarambulona kaapadi nadipinavu Nutana vathsaramuna sthutiyimpa chesinavu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yesayya palikitivi aa samudra pongulalo Nisshabdhamuga yoora kundumu nimmalamuga{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Bhayapadina shishulato rayamuna palikitivi Bhayapadakudi nene achairyamu thechchukonudi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thuphanu rege thvarlo tarangamulu leche Aapitivayyaa devaa apada bapitivi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Mundlaku badulu gonji devadarulu molachu Undunu soochanalugaa nityampu khyaatigaanu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Abhivrudhi jesedavu prabhuvaina yesu deva Adhikambu melulato munupatikante marala{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Siluvalo ma tuphaanu balilo bharinchitivi Halleluya padedanu caluvari yesu nadhaa{/lang-eng}
